plot: An ex-con drives as a wheelman to pay for his son's life saving heart operation, if he can stay out of prison, or avoid getting killed first.
plot_en: An ex-con drives as a wheelman to pay for his son's life saving heart operation, if he can stay out of prison, or avoid getting killed first.
plot_es: An ex-con drives as a wheelman to pay for his son's life saving heart operation, if he can stay out of prison, or avoid getting killed first.
title: Dirty Wheel
